text: Egha helɨn tuavimɨn zuir darasi, mughuriar kam barazima, an ovever mughuriamɨn mɨn zui. Egha a me gamima, me ovei. Ezɨ Godɨn Nguibamɨn tuavimɨn zuir darasi, me mughuriar kamra a barazima, a mati ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuim isi mughuriam. Egha a ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuim me ganɨdi. Tinara gavgavigh ingangarir kamagh garim damuam? Bar puvatɨ.
